price: 96 Rends le bien pour le mal. Nous connaissons parfaitement leurs allégations.
arabic: ٱدۡفَعۡ بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَۚ نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: id'faʿ bi-allatī hiya aḥsanu al-sayi-ata naḥnu aʿlamu bimā yaṣifūna
